div.p: OK so ah my name's Brian McAllister and I'm a co-founder of a group called Roadtrip Nation
and basically Roadtrip Nation started out over some frustration.
We graduated from university and we didn't know exactly what we wanted to do with our lives,
But we didn't identify with becoming lawyers, doctors or accountants and so we decided to take
a road trip across the United States and talk to different people from all walks of life
and simply ask them how did you get to where you are today?
And hopes of this entire journey was to get a better understanding of what we want to do with our own lives.
Erm, to date we've been putting hundreds of other students on road trips.
